mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT tc.trialCommentId, tc.parentId, tc.`order`, tc.depth, tc.writer, tc.content, tc.status, tc.regDt, 0 AS 'created', IF(tc.userId IS NULL, 1, 0) AS 'anonymous', tc.ip, IF(tc.userId IS NULL, NULL, (SELECT u.profile FROM UserTb u WHERE tc.userId = u.userId)) AS 'profile', fnc.order_num FROM ( SELECT fnc_hierarchi2() AS id, @level AS level , @order_num:=@order_num+1 as 'order_num' FROM (SELECT @start_with := #{rootId}, @id := @start_with, @level := 0, @order_num:=0) vars JOIN TrialCommentTb WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) fnc JOIN TrialCommentTb tc ON fnc.id = tc.trialCommentId ) A WHERE (A.depth = 2 AND A.`status` = 1) OR (A.depth = 1 AND A.`status` = 1) OR (A.depth = 1 AND A.`status` = 2 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TrialCommentTb tc2 WHERE tc2.parentId = A.trialCommentId AND tc2.`status` = 1 )) order by order_num asc

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT tc.trialCommentId, tc.parentId, tc.`order`, tc.depth, tc.writer, tc.content, tc.status, tc.regDt, IF(tc.userId = #{userId}, 1, 0) as 'created', IF(tc.userId IS NULL, 1, 0) AS 'anonymous', tc.ip, IF(tc.userId IS NULL, NULL, (SELECT u.profile FROM UserTb u WHERE tc.userId = u.userId)) AS 'profile', fnc.order_num FROM ( SELECT fnc_hierarchi2() AS id, @level AS level, @order_num:=@order_num+1 as 'order_num' FROM (SELECT @start_with := #{rootId}, @id := @start_with, @level := 0, @order_num := 0) vars JOIN TrialCommentTb WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) fnc JOIN TrialCommentTb tc ON fnc.id = tc.trialCommentId) A WHERE (A.depth = 2 AND A.`status` = 1) OR (A.depth = 1 AND A.`status` = 1) OR (A.depth = 1 AND A.`status` = 2 AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM TrialCommentTb tc2 WHERE tc2.parentId = A.trialCommentId AND tc2.`status` = 1 )) order by order_num asc
